ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBChainsaw
ThingDef.description: Sawwwwwwwwwwwww!!! Legend has it that the Pirate King was a lumberjack before he became a king, and after his many battles, he discovered he'd never forgotten the feel of a chainsaw. So the Pirate King asked the master craftsman of the time to design the weapon. He was very pleased with the huge and terrifying shape of the weapon.The pirates were so impressed that they began to make copies of the weapon, but it was so heavy that ordinary people could not use it properly. Some scholars believe it was the main cause of the Pirate King's death in the assassination.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBCutSaber
ThingDef.description: The damage type of this weapon is heat damage. Thermal weapons from the Pirate King's time, although ancient, their thermal blades are still effective against most modern armor, and some nostalgic pirates use them as melee weapons.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBHammer
ThingDef.description: A power hammer made of platinum with a power-assisted propulsion engine that is extremely lethal, this weapon is heavily used by Diamond Bone Warriors. Some people think that the sword is only a gorgeous decoration. This is the real melee weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBGreatSword
ThingDef.description: The sword made of Multimolecular Steel has a very high toughness. The blade peak is processed by a monomolecular coating, which is very sharp but it is easy to wear. There have been no damage records for this sword brought back by a warrior from the battlefield, but there are more people thinks that he has never used...\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBDXS
ThingDef.description: The legendary redstone weapon will generate a plasma blade in response to the user's emotional changes, which can achieve the cutting effect of the high frequency knife and is very stable.The redstone cannot be shaped by temperature and physics, it can only absorb the master's ideas to "Growing", so shaped weapons are extremely rare. Diamond Bone has been conducting a lot of metamorphosis experiments, hoping to find out its principles for mass production. This military weapon seems to have lost its vitality.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBDestoryer
ThingDef.description: The damage type of this weapon is heat damage. A horrible melee weapon, the power spear can effectively penetrate the armor. Because the Flame Legion often uses this weapon to poke the prisoner of war from the back for warning and barbecue, so it is also called the "Ass Burster".\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBTractor
ThingDef.description: This weapon has a chance to increase the pain of the target. The body of the weapon is composed of a bunch of barbs, and everything comes out as soon as it is inserted. Originally just an ordinary slaughtering tool, what made it widely known was torture called "digging treasure" in medieval civilization. During the torture, the executioner puts a piece of wet soap on the ground and then forces the victim with his bare hands to pick it up. When the prisoner stooped and bent his hips, the executioner used this weapon to perform a thrusting on his hips, and then loosened the prisoner and allowed him to die slowly. In history, this soap-picking gesture was interpreted by prisoners, and some people even picked up the soap with a side-turn, but they finally succumbed to the power of several big men and were forced to hang down in a classic pose. Although the cruelty of this torture is staggering, it is not ordinary civilians who can enjoy such torture, but some well-known persons or nobles who are opposed to those in power. They will wriggle and groan on the ground before they lose their breath. Some people will even try to put the internal organs back into their belly. This rare celebrity ugliness is extremely ornamental and topical, so every time it attracts a large number of people to eat melons and watch. As for why the Flame Legion has such weapons, I think it should be unnecessary to explain.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBPowerPunch
ThingDef.description: This weapon was made by a designer who saw an irrational prisoner punching his fist against the wall and got inspiration. Putting it on to remove the wall will not hurt your hands.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBTwinStarTears
ThingDef.description: This weapon has a chance to slow down the target's movement speed. There's an ancient project among the Star Explorer called Twin Star, where they're said to automatically program all identical twins into the project. To train for espionage missions, the project manager will give the twins a symmetrical object as a token that can tell right from left. There was an extremely rare and beautiful identical twin brother and sister in history, and the people in charge at the time treasured them very much. He specifically asked the craftsmen to make the two daggers out of the Star Tear as a token for them. However, that brother and sister refused to accept the mission of Twin Star when they grew up, and even committed the crime of incest because of love, forcing the person in charge to send an executive officer to solve them. In order to protect the baby sister, the brother pretended to commit suicide with his dagger, He took another dagger and pretended to be his sister. The executive officer found out that there was a problem when he raped him. The fooled executive was furious and shoot him into a honeycomb. His sister has long disappeared in this time. The story of the pseudo-sister rescued the sister quickly became a hot topic. The double-dagger was widely copied under the tale. The military of Star Explorer even thought that the weapon represented wit and courage, so it was compiled into the assault force.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XevaBHFBlade
ThingDef.description: The XEO exclusive melee weapon, a blade made of Song Crystals that can cut through objects at the molecular level. Legend has it that singing can overclock this weapon and produce terrible destructive power, but many scholars point out that this is not scientific, just superstition of those assassins. Even so, XEO still has a lot of perverts singing and chopping people.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBHeartSeeker
ThingDef.description: A heavy pistol, equipped with weapons at close range of the XEO, the members of the organization like to call this weapon a "Hand Cannon". The high-speed dam bomb fired can cause great blockage and lethality to the creature and the bullet is huge. The huge firepower of the bullets led to the use of a bullet nest design for the chamber, so there were shortcomings such as insufficient storage of ammunition and inconvenient loading. But the members of the organization felt that these are not important because they always pull out their knife before finishing their shots.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBWhiteDwarf
ThingDef.description: The damage type of this weapon is blunt damage, and it penetrates normal energy shields. A heavy pistol, a medium and close defense weapon produced from Diamond Bone designed to effectively prevent target moving. The MP Steel Bullet used can produce a strong blocking force when hitting the target. However, this bullet will have a large deviation in long-distance flight, so when you want to attack a distant target, you don’t have to waste time aiming.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBFireBeast
ThingDef.description: A flamethrower. Although it is bulky, it is equipped by many soldiers of the Flame Legion because they think this weapon is "Convenience". What exactly does "Convenience" mean? This is a story. According to legend, a tribal cook prepared 36 people to grill food for a festival. He felt that it was too slow to roast one by one, and he invented a "Kitchenware". Because the food is roasted tender and delicious, this "Kitchenware" has been highly praised in the banquet, and its manufacturing method has also been spread, so the meaning of "Convenience" is...\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBRainStorm
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun. That the Jaeger used to replace the pistol. Close-range weapons with a high rate of fire can effectively carry out cross-fire and continuous suppression. However, the stability of this gun is very poor and the bullets have floated in the middle distance. There was a record that an officer was beaten by a soldier with a Rain Storm behind because he was rushing ahead.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBRapid
ThingDef.description: Semi-automatic pistol. Standard equipment for Star Explorer, weapons for home and travel. It has a high rate of fire and is stable. Most of the components are made of graphite fiber, which is hardly affected by the metal fatigue caused by the continuous fire. There have been records of 1000 shots of the pistol without jamming. Because of its light weight and low recoil, it is especially popular with women.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBGvE
ThingDef.description: A Double pistol. It consists of two pistols with different recoil and firepower. It needs to rotate in accordance with the recoil of the fire to make the true power of these two guns. However, how can you aim at the target after rotation? So it is said that to use these guns, you must first learn Gun Fu. The scary thing is that many people blasted their mentors and even their heads in the process of learning.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBHorizon
ThingDef.description: A blunt damage rifle. This weapon will stun the target when it hits the head. The Diamond Bone Horizon rifle has good performance instability and a rate of fire. The special shape of its bullet warhead will generate impact when hitting the target to brake and stop the target, but in exchange for it has almost no armor-piercing effect. Some people think that this is a good thing because they like to use this gun to hit the head of the helmet family, look at their faces when they are dizzy, and grab them when they are beautiful.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBRoar
ThingDef.description: A large heat damage shotgun. The Flame Legion's Roar shotgun is a very cruel weapon. The bullets it uses are much larger than conventional shotguns, and in order to increase the lethality, the steel balls are replaced with fragments. A military doctor once said that if a light machine gun can make people into a honeycomb, this weapon is to make people into a meat sauce. There are so many wounds that even the automatic medical bed of midworld can't handle it. The injured person said, "I think I can be rescue..e..d..." He was dead before he finished talking.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBPython
ThingDef.description: A machine gun. The python machine gun is a Jaegar's class machine gun. The bullet has a good braking force and its range is also an advantage. The Jaegar uses it to create long-range fire suppression. However, the back seat of this weapon is huge, and the gun body will rise seriously. Once, a new soldier stunned down the officer standing behind because of the recoil of the gun during training.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBBlueBee
ThingDef.description: A pulse rifle. It uses carbon crystal bullets and has excellent armor-piercing effects. It is one of the products that the Star Explorer is proud of. The name Blue Bee because it will make a buzzing sound after starting. People like to call it a BB gun. The note on the butt is printed "Don’t bring this gun to animals." This is because an explorer once used this gun to tame the unicorn and was trampled into meat sauce.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBAssassin
ThingDef.description: A single-shot rifle. Good range, stability, and noise reduction effect. It is the favorite firearm of the XEO assassin. This gun could have auto-fire mode, and it became a single shot because of an accident. The assassins will remove the silencer before the assassination, and fire gunshot to air at a high place. The number of gunshots represents how many people will die. This is done to give the target a fair chance to survive, and the assassin can also demonstrate his ability to gain fame. This ritual is called the "Knell of Death". It is said that a female assassin once fired a gun in the clock tower without turning off the automatic mode. She shot five times in a row and one of the shots hit the big bell. There is actually only one assassination target. She hesitated whether to kill someone to fill the numbers. At this time, the assassination target that was alarmed by the bell found her and shot at her. Her knee was hit and became a "Fallen Girl". She rolled off the clock tower. Although she made a standard "Leap of Faith" at the last minute, not every bell tower has haystacks... Because her death was so funny, this thing was spread madly everywhere, which damaged the reputation of XEO. After this incident, the auto key of the gun was disappeared.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBEclipse
ThingDef.description: A Minigun, overwhelming bullets can cover the sun, so it is called eclipse. There was a group of aboriginal people who are trait with trigger-happy and used this weapon to repel the Jaeger, but after the battle, all the people's arms broken.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBCPW
ThingDef.description: A heavy long-range weapon used by Diamond Bone. Please make sure that there are no teammates in front of you before use. Remember not to let anyone who has a record of trigger-happy use it. Once a training officer was bombed by the gun because he forgot to read the student’s "Bio Menu".\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBWolfHowl
ThingDef.description: A positron weapon, the huge echo when firing is similar to howling wolves, so it is called Wolf Howl. Many Jaeger snipers did not use this weapon in accordance with safety regulations and had made a lot of casualties in frontline troops, which made this weapon banned for a period of time. Some snipers accused by the military court refuted "It's not that my shooting skill is a problem, it's you who ran in and killed yourself."\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBHeadShot
ThingDef.description: The bullets of this weapon can fly through the wall. A heat damage sniper rifle. This gun has only appeared in Flame Legion’s forces. The body of the gun has no firing structure at all. In simple terms, it is a sculpture shaped like a firearm, so the bullets it fires are very unstable. Head being hit by this unstable bullet will be like an exploding watermelon, so this weapon is called Headshot. Although it is very unscientific, it does have a large number of records of killing targets. No matter the location is a secret room, a basement, a variety of rooms...even prison cells, It also has a record of its kills. And behind this weapon is a story of an Avengers. A fat man once confessed to a "Beautiful" woman many times and was rejected, and a newly joined boy confessed to the woman for the first time and succeeded, which hurt the fat man. Curiosity, he secretly opened the boy's "Bio Menu" to check and found that all the values ​​were lower than him, there was only one "Pretty" trait, and then the fat boy who was desperate left the village. A few years later, when the woman and her husband were intimate in the bedroom, her beautiful face suddenly exploded, scaring her husband's "Dick" to soften and urinate all over the place. And what made people more scared was that the bullet did not hit in a straight line. So there is a legend that was not a bullet shot from the gun, but a kind of anger from FFF. "Did your partner's brain suddenly spray on your face? Don't be surprised, because justice has come!"\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBEagleEye
ThingDef.description: Jaeger's favorite sniper rifle has the characteristics of long-range and lightweight, which makes it easy for the sniper to find and transfer the sniper point. And the double-click shooting method they usually use is from a legendary shooter. It is said that Jaeger has stimulated many resistance forces because of monopoly resources. A man of them makes Jaeger scared. His aiming speed is incredible, two consecutive shots every time. The "parts" of the human body he chooses to shoot are even more unbearable. Many Jaeger thought he did it deliberately to create fear. Because of his magical precision and speed, he was called "Eagle Eye" by Jaeger. A few years later, Eagle Eye was arrested in a spy campaign. The military sent him to torture out of curiosity. Shockingly, Eagle Eye is born with amblyopia, the reason for acting alone is because of fear of shooting teammates. As for his explanation of the extraordinary skill, he replied extraordinarily "I didn't aim at all, just hit two shots at the approximate place, but your imagination is great." Because he was so amazing, in the end, he not only without being executed, he fell in love with the torture officer and became Jaeger's sniper chief instructor. This gun is named after this.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBProbe
ThingDef.description: A gauss sniper rifle of Star Explorer. Because of the use of lengthened magnetic rails and carbon crystal bullets, the armor-piercing effect is very good, and it can be seen in many operations and battles. A special police officer once used this gun to hold the robbers who wearing power armor and said, "If you want to turn around and run away, you must think about it. This thing is to help people detect heat without taking off their pants."\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBRedLine
ThingDef.description: A rifle used for the long-range assassination. The red gun body plus the red laser and the tinting sound made by the shell hitting the ground during unloading are the characteristics of this gun, as conspicuous as a star. Is it really okay to use this gun to assassinate? "Using chaos as a cloak, fear as a blade". This is why XEO's assassins are never low-key. This eye-catching gun hinted at "I'm Here". It has a poignant story. Once a pair of assassin lovers received an order from the elders to kill each other or they would be executed. They don’t want to kill each other, they can’t fight face to face, so they decided to solve it with sniping. Who found each other shot first. As a result, the dead side was holding a red-line rifle with a blank bullet in the clip. Another person knew that he was sad and committed suicide, but why would the elders give such orders? Because XEO organizations strictly prohibit homosexuality.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.description: Well! Warhammer is the king of weapons in the Middle Ages.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.description: This weapon has a chance to slow down the target's movement speed. The two daggers are together again.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. ThingDef.Name: XEO_HFBlade_MM_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona High Freguency Tachi
ThingDef.description: Faster...Go Faster!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. ThingDef.Name: XOG_Katana_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Katana
ThingDef.description: The katana has a very beautiful shape and was once known as the best chopping weapon. Even after thousands of years, many high-tech melee weapons are still based on its shape.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XOG_Bayonet_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bayonet
ThingDef.description: The dagger for military use, the groove on the spine and the ergonomic grip make it lighter and more flexible than ordinary daggers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBToughGuy
ThingDef.description: The damage type of this weapon is blunt damage. A heavy pistol. There was a very stubborn pirate who insisted on using pistols as weapons. He ignored the dissuasion of his companions and commanders. He did not use other firearms, and he added sights to the pistols to deal with long-range combat. One day, he used this pistol to shoot a soldier wearing power armor, and finally fought for an afternoon. Although he was shot multiple times, he shot the soldiers to death. This weapon has also become a symbol of the tough guy "You may not be very good, but super hard".\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBFuse
ThingDef.description: A heat damage pistol. The weapon of the pirate king period. Launching plasma was very fatal in an environment where armor development was not mature at the time. There have been many voices against research in the pirates, but the pirate king ruled out the public opinion and insisted on creating weapons with overwhelming power. This pistol, which was first researched and mass-produced, became the fuse of his future betrayal.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XGun_Assassin_SM_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assassin (Shooting MOD)
ThingDef.description: I just like to put the automatic key back.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBDisturber
ThingDef.description: A grenade gun. Disturber can send small grenade into the high wall, even the roof can penetrate. Do you want to watch the enemy dance? Use this to get it right. Because of its long range, large grenades cannot be used, so the destructive power is limited, but this is not important, because this weapon is originally used to make trouble, Ho Yeah!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBIronBall
ThingDef.description: A blunt damage rifle. The kinetic energy weapon that fired the big iron ball. It is said that the designer designed this weapon because "B-Daman" played too much. However, this is not a toy. Many people have despised this seemingly non-lethal iron ball. Finally, their "Ball" broke into pieces.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBHeat
ThingDef.description: A heat damage rifle, a weapon of the pirate king period. Developed after the fuse pistol. Which fired plasma to cause heat damage, the purpose is to cope with medium and long-distance combat. In order to achieve the effect of fire suppression, a high fire rate design is used. However, the high temperature of the plasma causes the airflow to be unstable, resulting in deviations from long-range hits. The high temperature and continuous fire also cause serious metal fatigue in the barrel after a round of shooting. So only with a large amount of equipment can see the true power of this weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XGun_CPWMWC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charged Particle Weapon MIL WC

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBBigCannon
ThingDef.description: Blunt damage weapon. The bullets of this weapon can fly through the wall. A 12-pound cannon with solid shells, although holding this weapon can make people look strange. But as a pirate, it is reasonable and logical to use this gun to bombard people.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MPBFPM_XEBLightSpear
ThingDef.description: A heat damage sniper rifle in the Pirate King's period. It fires plasma. They were designed to compensate for the shortcomings of the hot rifles in long-range combat. They controlled the amount of plasma fired to improve the stability of long-distance flight and the time for guns to re-cool.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XGun_16R_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Ruins Maker(One-time Weapon)
ThingDef.description: For One-time use only. 16 rounds of rocket artillery. The lethality is huge, the weight is amazing, and of course, the cost is also amazing too. There used to be a Jaeger force attacking the town where XEO was located. Unfortunately, the soldiers were constantly harassed by the assassins. The commander was finally mad after a few days and ordered the bombing of the town with this thing. The soldiers were shocked by his decision. After a round of explosions, everyone looking at the ruins couldn't get anything, and the commander would also have to subsidize the military expenses of the operation.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XGun_Shock_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shock(One-time Weapon)
ThingDef.description: For One-time use only. Effective in destroying buildings and stun the target when hit. The use of special waves to cause resonance effects can cause tremendous damage to the building. Must remember where you stand before using it, and it will be terrible if you don’t. A story is printed on the cover of the manual to warn users. A story is printed on the cover of the manual to warn users. There was a model who was targeted by the leader because she was too useless. The leader asked her to tear down a wall in the town that needed to be rebuilt. If she could not complete it, she would be sold. It sounds like a very simple job, but when she saw her "Bio Menu", she realized that it was an impossible task. When she was trying to find other ways, a stargazer merchant passed by and sold her a handful of things, saying that it could be solved for her. The merchant repeatedly told her to read the manual before using it. A few minutes later, she finished reading it and picked up the thing and shoot at the wall. Then she immediately fainted, and when she woke up again, she found herself in the wilderness, and saw the madness leader heading at her with a pistol. Yes, she has read the manual, but she can't understand what fucking is written on it.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: XGun_MolotovExpress_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Molotov Express(One-time Weapon)
ThingDef.description: For One-time use only. It is said that there was a lazy drunkard who called the nearby bar every day to send drinks. His voice was very annoying and the speech was even more aggressive. On a New Year’s night, The bar business was so good and the bartender was busy but kept receiving his phone call. Finally, the bartender was annoyed by him, he used this thing to express some "Molotov" for him, and then the bartender joined the Flame Legion.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

A BIG Bomb here!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
